sentence: 124 ||| Patients ||| 6.48 ||| Results of the LIPS study show that in patients with average cholesterol levels, early cholesterol-lowering treatment with fluvastatin, 80 mg/d, following first PCI with or without stenting resulted in a 5.3% absolute reduction and a 22% relative reduction in the risk of fatal or nonfatal major adverse cardiac events during 4 years of follow-up compared with placebo.
